title: High School DxD Specials
synopsis: A series of 3-5 minute specials that were bundled with the HighSchool DxD DVD and Blu-rays. They are a stand alone set of episodes that are not a part of any story line in particular.
characters: ['Gremory, Rias', 'Himejima, Akeno', 'Hyoudou, Issei', 'Toujou, Koneko', 'Argento, Asia', 'Kiba, Yuuto', 'Sitri, Souna', 'Shinra, Tsubaki', 'Motohama', 'Matsuda']
